title: The Collected Sam & Max: Surfin' the Highway
description: Containing all of the Sam & Max material published by Marvel's Epic Comics and the one-page strips commissioned by the comic's current publisher, LucasArts, The Collected Sam & Max is replete with the wry humor, witty repartee, and first-class graphics that have earned this quirky pair of furry flatfoots a rabidly devoted following. Color illustrations throughout.
author: Steve Purcell
